#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
 
typedef long long int ll ;
 
#define MAX_SIZE 500001
#define MOD 10000
 
int divisors[MAX_SIZE] = { 0 };
 
void generate_divisors() {
	for (int i = 2; i <= 708; i++) {
		for (int j = i; j<=(MAX_SIZE/i) ; j++) {
			if(i == j) {
				divisors[i * j] += 1;
			}
			else {
				divisors[i * j] += 2;
			}
		}
	}
}
 
bool flag=false ;
 
ll power(ll a, ll p, bool& flag) {
	ll result = 1;
	for (int i = 0; i < p; ++i) {
		result *= a;
		if (result >= MOD) {
			result %= MOD;
			flag = true;
		}
	}
	return result;
}
 
void solve()
{
    int test ;
    scanf("%d",&test) ;
    generate_divisors() ;
    while(test--) {
        int n ;
        scanf("%d",&n) ;
        int div=divisors[n] ;
        flag=false ;
        ll res ;
        if(div%2==0) {
            res=power(n,div/2,flag) ;
        }
        else {
            res=power((int)sqrt(n),div,flag) ;
        }
        if(flag==true) {
            printf("%04d\n",res) ;
        }
        else {
            printf("%d\n",res) ;
        }
    }
}
 
int main()
{
    //freopen("input.txt","r",stdin) ;
    //freopen("out.txt","w",stdout) ;
    solve() ;
    return 0 ;
}
